name: Space Runner [Prototype]
description:
Space Runner is an old unfinished endless runner prototype.

Controls: Keyboard: Xbox360Controller (Win): Virtual Buttons Left: A J KP4 LeftArrow Joystick Center Left Right: D L KP6 RightArrow Joystick Center Right Rotate Left: Q U KP1 - LB Top Left Rotate Right: E O KP9 - RB Top Right Jump: W, S I, K KP8, KP5 Space, Up, Down A, B, X, Y Bottom Left, Bottom Right Reset: R - - - Back, Start Top Center
